headline: Xcel Energy Names Ryan Long Executive Vice President and Chief Legal and Compliance Officer
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, June 16, 2025--Xcel Energy announced today Ryan Long as the company’s executive vice president and chief legal and compliance officer, effective immediately. Long, currently president of Xcel Energy – Minnesota, North Dakota and South Dakota, takes over the role held by Rob Berntsen, who accepted a position outside the company.
